title: Advocates argue for changes to the way Georgia's HOPE scholarship is awarded, recovered
description:
Ty Tagami

Capitol Beat News Service

AI-assisted summary Advocates argue Georgia's economy is harmed by its lack of need-based financial aid for college students.

Georgia is one of only two states that does not offer financial aid based on a student's financial need.

title: Georgia’s labor market: unemployment down but workforce participation also falls
description:
The National Statistics Office (Geostat) reports that Georgia’s unemployment rate declined in the third quarter of 2025, even as fewer people participated in the labor force. The unemployment rate dropped by 0.5 percentage points year-on-year, reaching 13.3%.

Despite the improvement in unemployment...
